0.text: Hello! This is is an example dialogue. NPCs, like me, will sometimes give out quests with potentially interesting rewards, including rare items.

1.text: This is the end of the example dialogue. Bye!

2.text: Most quests in this game are optional and you can complete them in your own time. Some quests also have entry requirements, for example you must be a certain level or have a certain item.

6.text: Unfortunately, there is no opiton 3. Please choose one of the other two.

7.text: Wonderful! In the future, NPCs will also be able to buy items from you that you no longer need. NPCs usually do not wander, though this is not true for all NPCs.

3.text: Would you like me to repeat info on quests or is it clear?
